text:
We were glad to have prestige family clinic in our neighbourhood that is within mins walk from our place. My mum was old and not mobile so we requested Dr Chiew to do a house visit to help take alook at my mum's condition. He obliged on the house call and was very patient in examining my mum. He even followed up with my mum's condition by whatapps. Really appreciate his care and concern.

Another visit to the clinic was made by my helper as she has a deep cut accidentally. Dr Lim said he was fm KK emergency department so he is very familiar with accidental cuts and wound He assured that my helper did not hurt her tendon with the cut.

Really glad that we have experienced and  competent doctors in our neighbourhood.  As the clinic is still quite new in the neighbourhood, we do not need to wait for long Qs and it is really time saving. Greatly recommend!

I want to express my appreciation for the exceptional service I received during my recent visit to Prestige Family Clinic. Dr. Joshua Chiew's professionalism and attention to detail were truly commendable. He took the time to meticulously explain my condition, which I found to be very reassuring and valuable.

Moreover, I would like to acknowledge the clinic's efficiency in responding promptly to my inquiries prior to my visit. This level of organization and responsiveness certainly contributed to a positive overall experience.

Thank you once again for the excellent care and service provided by your team at Prestige Family Clinic.

++



My second time seeking Dr. Joshua Chiew's expertise.

I am truly impressed by his unwavering commitment to providing the highest level of care to his patients. Dr. Joshua Chiew's compassion, patience, and professional demeanor have not gone unnoticed, and I am grateful for the valuable advice and treatment plan he has provided.

I would like to take this opportunity to thank him and his team for their dedication to their patients' well-being. I wish Prestige Family Clinic continued success in all his future endeavors.

Thank you once again for the outstanding care.
Dr Joel is detailed and friendly and takes the time to explain clearly ☺️
Doctor Joshua is professional and uses his expertise to give me his best medical opinion and advices. Keep up the good work!
Friendly, experience and professional - Dr Joshua and Dr Joel!
